body_html: I addressed comments from @jendap. In addition, I realized that there was an issue with BUILD_TAG values from matrix builds. Those tags have special characters such as "," and "=", which make the Docker image names illegal. I modified ci_build.sh a little to solve that problem.
body_text: I addressed comments from @jendap. In addition, I realized that there was an issue with BUILD_TAG values from matrix builds. Those tags have special characters such as "," and "=", which make the Docker image names illegal. I modified ci_build.sh a little to solve that problem.
body: I addressed comments from @jendap. In addition, I realized that there was an issue with BUILD_TAG values from matrix builds. Those tags have special characters such as "," and "=", which make the Docker image names illegal. I modified ci_build.sh a little to solve that problem.
